io.dropwizard.server

Interface ServerFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Discoverable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServerFactory, DefaultServerFactory, SimpleServerFactory

    public interface ServerFactory
extends Discoverable
    A factory for building Server instances for Dropwizard applications.
    See Also:
    DefaultServerFactory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.eclipse.jetty.server.Server build(Environment environment)
      Build a server for the given Dropwizard application.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        org.eclipse.jetty.server.Server build(Environment environment)
        Build a server for the given Dropwizard application.
        Parameters:
        environment - the application's environment
        Returns:
        a Server running the Dropwizard application
